title: Sample Book, "Fabbriche Italiane di Seterie, Como, Serie C Vol. 1 DAL 1322 AL Couleur", 1870–79
medium:

provenance:

D&D Building Lobby

creditline: Museum purchase from Friends of Textiles Fund
description: Book of jacquard woven silks, separated by transparent paper sheets, bound in leather. Samples in various colors with floral and geometric designs; many monochrome, some in two colors.
